comments.author: Maria Tadic
comments.content: This looks so yummy - especially the fried egg part.  I never realized fried rice was so simple.  I always thought there were tons of ingredients!  Can't wait to try this out!

comments.author: Dahlia Abraham-Klein
comments.content: Reminds me of Korean Bibimbap. Thanks for sharing this. It's a quick meal when you are starved for something nutritious and hearty.

comments.author: Melané Botha
comments.content: When next you cook rice cook extra and freeze in portions. Then nuke for a few minutes when required and proceed with your recipe. And for those who prefer: cauliflower rice works beautifully with this as well!

comments.author: Helen
comments.content: I was looking for a leftovers recipe, thank you

comments.author: Kari@Loaves n Dishes
comments.content: I'm such a sucker for a fried egg on top of almost any dish!  Totally digging the kale in this fried rice.

comments.author: Chung-Ah | Damn Delicious
comments.content: Such a unique fried rice - definitely need to add this to my weeknight menu!

comments.author: Chris @ Spekko Rice
comments.content: I'm a batchelor so this is right up my alley! Didn't think Fried Rice would be so simple!

comments.author: chris
comments.content: This is really awesome.  I added fresh ginger and garlic with the onions, brown sugar, chile paste, and rice vinegar with the soy sauce mix, and cilantro at the very end.  Excellent.
